nodes.text:
A police station was located in Capital City on the planet Lothal. During the reign
of the Galactic Empire, Elainye Pryce, the mother of Arihnda Pryce, was held in custody at the station after being arrested by the Lothal police on the charge of embezzlement following complaints from the office of Governor Ryder Azadi. Arindha and her father Talmoor attempted to visit Elainye but were told by the police at the station that she had been denied bail and they had also been ordered to not allow her visitors.
